net.doo.snap.process

Interface TextRecognition


  • public interface TextRecognition
    Text recognition API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextRecognizer withoutPDF(Language defaultLanguage, java.util.List<Page> pages)
      Provides TextRecognizer which can be used to recognize text.
      TextRecognizer withoutPDF(java.util.List<Language> languages, java.util.List<Page> pages)
      Provides TextRecognizer which can be used to recognize text.
      TextRecognizer withPDF(Language defaultLanguage, Document document, java.util.List<Page> pages)
      Provides TextRecognizer which can be used for creating PDF with embedded text recognition result.
      TextRecognizer withPDF(java.util.List<Language> languages, Document document, java.util.List<Page> pages)
      Provides TextRecognizer which can be used for creating PDF with embedded text recognition result.

    • Method Detail

      • withPDF

        TextRecognizer withPDF(Language defaultLanguage,
                       Document document,
                       java.util.List<Page> pages)
        Provides TextRecognizer which can be used for creating PDF with embedded text recognition result.
        Parameters:
        defaultLanguage - to perform recognition with. Use it to skip part with language detection and only if you are sure with what language OCR should be preformed with.
        document - to which sandwiched pdf will be written
        pages - to perform OCR on
        Returns:
        TextRecognizer

      • withPDF

        TextRecognizer withPDF(java.util.List<Language> languages,
                       Document document,
                       java.util.List<Page> pages)
        Provides TextRecognizer which can be used for creating PDF with embedded text recognition result.
        Parameters:
        languages - to perform recognition with.
        document - to which sandwiched pdf will be written
        pages - to perform OCR on
        Returns:
        TextRecognizer

        Provides TextRecognizer which can be used to recognize text.
        Parameters:
        defaultLanguage - to perform recognition with. Use it to skip part with language detection and only if you are sure with what language OCR should be preformed with.
